common.error_friendly: Something went wrong. Please check your connection and try again.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your profile and app preferences.

deleteDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and your data from our servers.

login.subtitle: Your intelligent health companion. Start your journey with one click.
login.terms_privacy: By continuing, you agree to our <1>Terms of Service</1> and <3>Privacy Policy</3>.
login.error_description: Could not sign in. Please try again.

bottom_nav.log_title: What do you want to log?

home.title: Calorel
home.start_logging: Use the '+' button to start logging.

progress.title: Your Progress
progress.subtitle: Visualize your habits and progress over time.
progress.weight_progress_desc: Your actual weight compared to your goal trajectory.
progress.weight_progress_start_logging: Log your weight to start seeing your progress.

diets.title: Diet Plans
diets.subtitle: Explore, save, and start the perfect diet for you
diets.no_saved_diets: You haven't saved any diets yet.
diets.regenerate_dialog_desc: This will replace your current plan permanently. This action counts towards your weekly limit (1/week).
diets.gap_time_message: It's not meal time. Stay hydrated.

streak_modal.title: Current Streak
streak_modal.subtitle: You're on fire! Keep logging your meals to keep the streak alive.

exercise.title: Log Exercise
exercise.subtitle: Select the activity you performed to add it to your diary.

write_exercise.title: Describe the exercise
write_exercise.placeholder: Describe the duration, intensity of the...
write_exercise.example: Example: Yoga for 60 min, stretching and relaxed
write_exercise.ai_success_toast: Estimation ready! Review and add your exercise.

manual_exercise.title: Manual
manual_exercise.validation_error: Please enter a valid number of calories.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.badge_celebrations_desc: Show an animation when unlocking a new badge.
preferences.daily_reminders_desc: Receive a reminder to log your meals.

nutritional_goals.title: Nutritional Goals
nutritional_goals.subtitle: Set your daily nutritional targets manually.

ai_suggestions.title: AI Goal Suggestions
ai_suggestions.subtitle: Answer a few questions to get a personalized plan.
ai_suggestions.disclaimer: This will use one of your daily AI credits. The new goals will be applied to your profile.
ai_suggestions.toast_success: Nutritional plan updated with AI suggestions!

bmi_calculator.title: Your BMI
bmi_calculator.incomplete_data: Complete your weight and height in your profile to calculate your BMI.
bmi_calculator.tooltip: The Body Mass Index (BMI) uses your height and weight to estimate if your weight is healthy. Categories: Underweight (<18.5), Healthy (18.5-24.9), Overweight (25-29.9), Obesity (â‰¥30).

manual_food.title: Add Food Manually
manual_food.desc_placeholder: Add details to help the AI (ingredients, cooking method, etc.)

toasts.coming_soon_desc: This feature will be available soon.
toasts.delete_success_desc: Your account and all data have been permanently deleted.

ring_colors.title: Ring Colors
ring_colors.subtitle: On the homepage calendar, the colored rings around each date show how close you were to your daily calorie goal:
ring_colors.green_desc: Up to 100 calories over your goal.
ring_colors.red_desc: More than 200 calories over your goal.
ring_colors.dotted_desc: No meals were logged on that day.

request_feature.title: Request a Feature
request_feature.subtitle: Community Suggestions
request_feature.description: Vote for the ideas you like or submit your own. We prioritize the most voted features.

new_request_drawer.title: Submit a New Idea
new_request_drawer.description: Share your suggestion with the community. Your request will be anonymous.
new_request_drawer.desc_placeholder: Explain your idea in detail. What problem does it solve? How should it work?

edit_profile.title: Edit Profile
edit_profile.description: Make the changes you need and save them.
edit_profile.experience_first_time: No, this is my first time
edit_profile.toast_error: There was an error updating your profile.

zod.age_required: Age is required and must be at least 13.

gender.title: What is your gender?
gender.description: This helps us customize your goals and recommendations.

age.title: What is your age?
age.description: Your age helps us calculate your caloric needs.
age.label: Your age

experience.title: Have you used other apps?
experience.description: Tell us a bit about your previous experience.
experience.first_time: No, this is my first time

metrics.title: Your measurements
metrics.description: Enter your weight and height for accurate tracking.

motivation.title: What would you like to achieve?
motivation.description: This helps us personalize your experience.

goal.title: What is your main goal?
goal.description: Choose what you want to achieve with Calorel.

goal_weight.title: Set your goal
goal_weight.description: What is the weight you would like to reach?
goal_weight.label: Goal Weight
goal_weight.disclaimer: This will be the target you'll see on your progress chart.

weekly_rate.title: How fast do you want to reach your goal?
weekly_rate.description: Adjust the speed to fit your lifestyle.
weekly_rate.slow_desc: A slow pace is more sustainable in the long run.
weekly_rate.fast_desc: A fast pace requires a lot of discipline and big changes.
weekly_rate.balanced_desc: This is a balanced and healthy pace for most people.

health_connect.title: Connect Your Health
health_connect.description: Connect with Health Connect to import your steps, workouts, and more for more accurate calorie tracking.
health_connect.connect_success_desc: Your activity data will now sync automatically.
health_connect.permission_denied_desc: You can connect later from the settings.

final.title: You're one step away!
final.description: With Calorel, you're on the right path to your goals.

onboarding.toast_error: There was an error saving your profile.

diets_onboarding.step_country_desc: Select your country to personalize meals with local ingredients.
diets_onboarding.country_expansion_note: We are working on adding more countries soon. Thanks for your patience!
diets_onboarding.step1_desc: How much do you move daily?
diets_onboarding.step2_desc: Select if you have any preference or restriction.
diets_onboarding.step3_desc: Adjust the plan to your lifestyle.
diets_onboarding.generate_wait: AI is creating a unique plan for you. Please wait...
diets_onboarding.toast_success: Your personalized diet plan is ready!

timeline.today_desc: Unlock all premium features like the AI calorie scanner and much more.
timeline.reminder_desc: We will send you a reminder that your trial is about to end.
timeline.billing_desc: You will be charged unless you cancel at any time before.

scanner.help_desc: Center your plate in the viewfinder and take a photo. Our AI will analyze it to give you a nutritional estimate.
scanner.error_camera_desc: Could not access the camera. Please check permissions.

share.badge_message: I've unlocked the badge "{{name}}" in Calorel! ðŸ†
share.meal_message: Check out what I'm eating: {{food}} ðŸ¥— - via Calorel

tutorial.welcome_content: Let's take a quick tour so you can use the app like a pro.
tutorial.carousel_content: Here you will see your daily calories and macros. Swipe sideways to see your hydration level and health score.
tutorial.scanner_content: This is the magic button. Tap it to use AI to scan your food, or to log exercise manually.
tutorial.progress_content: Here you can see charts of your weight and evolution over time.
tutorial.settings_content: Configure your goals, preferences, and profile here.
